about:
Backend Software Engineer | Computer Science Graduate - University of Nairobi | KamiLimu Cohort 5.0 Mentee | Data Science/ML enthusiast.

 I am a Software Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the health care and financial industries. Skilled in API integrations, Analytical Skills, Web Design and Development, Data Analysis and Machine Learning. Strong engineering professional with a first-class honors degree focused in Computer Science from the University of Nairobi.

 Excellent communicator and team player owing to my vast experience working with other developers, stakeholders and clients support.
